title: Adorable video shows Golden Retriever plop its dirty rubber ball into a dice game
text:
Next time include everyone in family game night!

An adorable video going viral on social media shows a cute Golden Retriever dropping its ball onto a wooden table as its owner throws dice.

In the brief clip, the pooch's owner throws the dice onto a wooden board.

Scroll down for video

An adorable video making its way across social media shows a cute Golden Retriever throwing its tennis ball onto a wooden table as its owner cast dice

The large dog almost immediately throws its ball onto the board.

The camera pans to the dog who looks at its owner with extreme satisfaction.

As the video comes to a close, the dog looks from its owner to the board to see what the next move is.

When the pooch throws the ball, the camera pans to the dog and shows it looking pleased with itself

It is currently unknown where the video was filmed.

However, the video was initially posted last year and has since gone viral again. It was recently viewed more than 2 million times after being shared on Reddit Wednesday.

Let's hope the loyal pup is included in the next round.
description: An adorable video going viral on social media shows a cute Golden Retriever dropping its  ball onto a wooden table as its owner throws dice.
